description.value:
Trigger A creature not designated by Katlanthe approaches within 10 feet of the circle of stone columns

Effect The storm clouds release a boom of thunder. Creatures atop the plateau take @Damage[(2d10+9)[sonic]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:26|basic] save). On a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. The hazard rolls initiative.

details.description: Ominous storm clouds gather overhead, pulsating with flashes of blue-white lightning.
details.disable: @Check[religion|dc:23] (trained) to petition Gozreh for safe passage or @Check[arcana|dc:28], @Check[nature|dc:28], or @Check[occultism|dc:28] (expert) to disperse the storm's magical energies. A PC whose voice is exceptionally loud (such as using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bullhorn] cantrip) can also attempt to Disable this hazard with a @Check[diplomacy|dc:25] check to convince the Gozren priests that they mean no harm; the priests make a second prayer to dissipate the hazard on the following round, though they're unable to stop the sargassum heaps.
details.reset: The storm clouds disperse once no creature other than those designated by Katlanthe are atop the plateau.
details.routine:
(1 action) (divine, electricity) A bolt of lightning strikes a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] atop the plateau of the GM's choosing. Creatures in the area take @Damage[(2d10+9)[electricity]|traits:divine|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:28|traits:divine,electricity] save). On a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}. Creatures designated by Katlanthe within the area are infused with divine energy for 1 round. They gain the electricity trait and immunity to electricity damage, and all their attacks deal an additional 1d6 electricity damage.
